<FACE_ROD><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
...
Whatever is the matter?

<FACE_ROD><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
Ah, Soseki.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hello. What are you doing here? You
don't look very happy.

<FACE_ROD><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
...Tell me, Soseki. What do you have to
do for other people to treat you like an
adult?

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Like an adult? What brought this on?

<FACE_ROD><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
When I was visiting the next town
recently, a friend of mine said that I'm
too full of energy. Like a child.
<PAGE>
They said I need to relax and calm down
a little if I want to run a shop with
any success.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
You think so? Personally, I think you're
doing a pretty good job.

<FACE_ROD><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
But a lot of people have called me
childish in the past. I want people to
think I look trustworthy!

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I see.
<PAGE>
Then I have some advice for you.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
If you want people to start taking you
seriously, then you need to bring an
awareness of pauses into your speech.

<FACE_ROD><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
Pauses?

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Yes. This is quite a complex topic. A
brief pause can make all the difference
in how people look at you.
<PAGE>
Makes people who are acting emotionally
stop and take stock of the situation.
That's how being an adult works.

<FACE_ROD><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
Calming people down is the key?

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Look at you right now. You're calm, and
you're taking in my words and
thinking about them carefully, right?

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Being able to do this will really make
other people feel they can rely on you.

<FACE_ROD><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
A-Amazing! Soseki, you're amazing. I'm
literally amazed!
<PAGE>
Pauses... so how do you create them?

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
When talking, start by taking a breath
before you begin speaking. A breath is
the perfect length for a pause.
<PAGE>
Then use this technique sparingly, as
the situation requires. It takes a
little practice.

<FACE_ROD><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Thank you, Soseki. I'll try my best to
master it.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Glad to see you sounding more positive.
Good luck!
There you are! Hey, Soseki!

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh? What brings you here?

What do you think! Today's the deadline
for your article! Have you forgotten?

I know, I should have set a meeting
time and place. No matter... but do you
have the article?

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
A-Actually, about that...

You forgot about it? After I repeatedly
told you so many times never to forget
a deadline?

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
D-Don't get all emotional now. Staying
calm is one of the keys to being a real
adult...

Is it now? So as long as one is calm,
they can be an adult even if they don't
keep their promises? Is that it?

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
S-Sorry!

I can't believe it... running off? He's
such a child!

<FACE_ROD><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOSS>
I guess my worries weren't really all
that serious. I'm going to stop 
overthinking things!
